lines.text: All I want to know is why are we riding in a chariot with four white horses when there are hundreds of taxi cabs?
Well, four horses couldn't get into a taxi cab. Even if they had money!
Why are you driving so fast?
Well, I want to get to my daddy before I have an accident.
I hope I come up to your expectations.
Oh yes, on account of I'm not expecting too much.
Have you any other children, Professor? At large, I mean.
Let me remind you again the three N's of the youth and beauty special. No necking, not now and nnn-nnn.
